name: Atelier Lulua: Season Pass "Totori"
detailed_description:
This Season Pass allows to purchase the following downloadable content (9 items) for Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ for a discounted price.

Released on June 4th, 2019
- Lulua's Swimsuit "Bright Butterfly"
- Eva's Swimsuit "Glazed Coral"
- Aurel's Swimsuit "Surf Strider"
- Piana's Swimsuit "Vivid Two-color"

Released on July 30th, 2019
- Ficus's Outfit "Genius Magician"
- Nico's Outfit "The Boldness"
- Rorona's Outfit "Time Slip"
- Sterk's Outfit "Regal Butler"
- Playable Character: Totori

Note:
- Individual release dates are subject to change.
- Please check the official website for official details and more information.

short_description: This Season Pass allows to purchase the following downloadable content (9 items) for Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ for a discounted price.

fullgame.name: Atelier Lulua ~The Scion of Arland~ / ルルアのアトリエ ～アーランドの錬金術士４～

supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better, Graphic Memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better, Graphic memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
